info.description: API for loyalty program. Base url for all requests corresponds to VX environments e.g. localhost, t380.vx.dev, bs.staging.vx.dev. A sample URL for a banner endpoint would look like 'localhost/applications/loyalty/api/banner'
info.title: Loyalty Endpoints

get.summary: Get Banner options with text Fragment from G&F
get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you get thank you page banner option together with text and image

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: If you want to get User-Specific text fragment pass both Verivox authentication cookies ("VxCheckAuth" & "MyVerivoxAuth")

parameters.name: UserEmail
parameters.description: Using user email depending on the loyalty status we identify if we display the banner button and where the button leads, and also texts will be user specific if such account exists

200.description: all good you are getting your texts

400.description: bad input parameter(response will let you know which one)

500.description: something went very wrong, pls report

get.summary: Get Checkbox Data for all verticals
get.description: By calling this endpoint, you get the html snippet with flags (IsLoyaltyCheckboxDisplayed, IsDoiCheckboxDisplayed) for the loyalty/doi checkbox

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: If you want to get User-Specific text fragment pass both Verivox authentication cookies ("VxCheckAuth" & "MyVerivoxAuth")

parameters.name: UserEmail
parameters.description: This is required to determine User-Specific response even if the user is logged Out.

200.description: all good you are getting your response

400.description: bad input parameter(response will let you know which one)

500.description: something went very wrong, pls report

get.summary: Opt in or opt out the user
get.description: By calling this endpoint with cookie in place you receive user loyalty status

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: If you want to get User-Specific text fragment pass both Verivox authentication cookies ("VxCheckAuth" & "MyVerivoxAuth")

200.description: Account opted in or opted out

401.description: Not authorized because cookie missing or not valid

500.description: something went very wrong, pls report
